item.description:
Tickets are on sale now for the New England Americana Festival, Feb 25-27 at Church of Boston. Tickets are $8 for Thursday, $10 for Friday, $10 for Saturday or a 3 Day Pass for $20!

More info, band links and tickets at www.newenglandamericanafestival.com

Thu, Feb 25

The Accident that Led Me to the World 6:50-7:20
Jeff Byrd and Dirty Finch 7:30- 8:00
Odessa Rose 8:10- 8:40
Bryan Pero and the Tired Horses 8:50- 9:20
Brown Bird 9:30-10:00
Bean Pickers Union 10:10-10:40
Movers and Shakers 10:50-11:20
Kingsley Flood 11:30-12:00

with 2nd stage performers/announcers: Avi Jacob, Brendan Murphy, and Kier Byrnes
item.name: New England Americana Festival (NEAF) - Night 1
